Salutations!

Designer•Front-End Developer•User Experience

My name is James. I am a product designer and front-end developer. Really my job is to solve problems and create experiences which are useful, intuitive and beautiful. I am currently working at eBay on their Sitebuilder tool and various projects.

2016•Design

Easy Road

Travel App

A UX Exploration of a Travel App that collects and curates crowd sourced data, providing real and actionable advice to potential travelers.



2016•Design & Development

Newfi

Website for a Startup Financial Company

This is a major redesign for a startup mortgage and refinance company. They needed a site which better communicated what they had to offer in a clear and professional way. I was responsible for creating the design, and development.



2015•Design & Development

Ben & Jerry's

Website Facelift

A redesign of the New York Ben & Jerry's website. The former site had fought valiantly but it was in much need of a redesign, while using Ben & Jerry's distinctive design language and love of fun... and ice cream.



2014•Design

Circuit Trainer

Excercise App

It's hard to be happy if you're not healthy. This is a personal project fitness tracker app design which seeks to motivate users through challenges, and friendly social competition!



2014•Design

Rick Steves Website

Website Redesign

This is a personal project redesign of Rick Steves website circa 2014. Rick's site was looking quite long in the tooth, and was in need of a redesign to match the quality of its illustrious namesake.
